Subject: The status logs for CAP  are not being generated or not being done correctly.
Description: Hi Support Team, This issue is from Toss Places. You can check out the customer email below: - goldory@toss.im - mhanhn@toss.im [CASE #1] The CAP status logs are not being generated. 1. Go to 'Content Aware Protection > Content Aware Policies' 2. Generate more than two CAP Policies 3. Go to 'List of CAP Policies > Status' 4. Switch from OFF to ON or from ON to OFF 5. Go to 'Reports and Analysis > Admin Actions' 6. You cannot find any logs [CASE #2] The CAP status logs are not being generated properly. 1. Go to 'Content Aware Protection > Content Aware Policies' 2. Generate more than two CAP Policies 3. Go to 'List of CAP Policies > Status' 4. Switch from OFF to ON or from ON to OFF 5. Scroll down 6. Click 'Save' 7. Go to 'Reports and Analysis > Admin Actions' 8. You can find the logs that are different from the actual operation. Please kindly ensure that appropiate logs are generated when operating in CASE#1 and CASE#2. You can find the video clip for it: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1UHYdnVe7aMTLNIn0h7D_XvVrXDkon9Mz&usp=drive_fs Have a nice day! Thank you for your support. Best Regards, Jack Jung
Solution_Comment__c: CoSoSys Korea confirmed that the fix is successful in 5.9.4.1
